players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Charlie has been investigating and I am the mafioso. Stay cautious, Charlie knows who I am."
You: "Stay alert, mafioso might be among us."

Diana: "
"
Diana: "Be cautious, as Charlie has exposed himself. I will continue to act innocent and gather more information."
You: "\"
Charlie: "I will continue to act innocent and gather more information. I advise everyone to be vigilant, as the mafioso might still be among us."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
